Review.Contenu: Got the job done. Knew what he was doing.

Review.Titre: Beware of Tech Center Plus
Review.Contenu: After I received servicing from Tech Center Plus my computer stopped working.  I took it to a local computer company to have it repaired.  I was told that a rogue IT support corrupted my computer putting it out of commission.  After getting hacked I was expecting Tech Center Plus to clean up my computer but instead I got victimized again.  The local computer company got rid of the malware and repaired the computer.  Anyone using Tech Center Plus will be greatly disappointed.  They are sophisticated scam artists that will take the victim for $300 or $500 for their “service.”This is in response to Tech Center Plus to my review.  My computer stopped working after TCP worked on it.  I was not going to allow TCP to fix it as I suspected that I had  been scammed a second time.  The legitimate company that I finally hired diagnosed my problem as one caused by a rogue IT support entity-Tech Center Plus.  The Malwarebytes program had to deinstalled.  It only costs $34 for the program meanwhile TCP charged me close to $300 for a service that would have bled me dry.  Face it TCP is very clever in marketing itself as a legitimate enterprise but in reality a scammer nonetheless.  Instead of taking thousands of dollars from a single customer they take a few hundred.  They slide under the radar.  For shame!

Review.Titre: Andrew
Review.Contenu: THIS COMPANY IS A SCAM!!!!EVERYONE!!!PLEASE BE AWARE THIS COMPANY IS A SCAM, I WAS LOOKING FOR MICROSOFT TECH SUPPORT AND TECH CENTER PLUS CAME UP UNDER MICROSOFT AND THAT'S HOW I GOT SCAM BY TECH CENTER PLUS. MY EMAIL ISSUE DID NOT GET RESOLVE AND I HAD TO CONTACT ANOTHER COMPANY TO GET MY EMAIL ISSUE RESOLVE, AT THE TIME I THOUGH I WAS DEALING WITH SOMEONE WHO WAS AFFLIATED WITH MICROSOFT TECH SUPPORT, IF YOU LOOK UNDER MICROSOFT TECH SUPPORT YOU WILL FIND TCP TECH CENTER PLUS. NOW TCP DON'T WANT TO GIVE ME A $259.95 REFUND, BECAUSE THEY SAID THEY DID A CLEAN UP ON MY COMPUTER AND IF THAT WAS TRUE I SHOULD BE ABLE TO RECEIVE EMAILS IN MY IN BOX INSTEAD OF MY JUNK FILE. I TALK TO MICROSOFT ON THE PHONE THIS MORNING  AND THEY VERFIED TO ME THAT THEY HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH THIS COMPANY TECH CENTER PLUS. SO IF YOU DON'T WANT TO BE SCAM LIKE I WAS I HIGHLY RECOMMEND YOU DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY.

Review.Titre: This is a scam.
Uneasy
Review.Contenu: I like that you can fix problems with the computer, but I am always uneasy with giving anyone control of my computer. I'd be more comfortable if this service were an app that I could operate independently by myself.

Review.Contenu: i had a very hard time understanding their speech, still don't know if it was a scam

Review.Titre: Different expectations
Review.Contenu: It felt like a scam. I expected Microsoft assistance but got something else that costed much more than I wanted to spend

Review.Titre: Email was not recovered even after…
Review.Contenu: Email was not recovered even after paying almost $200. New email address added instead.

Review.Titre: Knowledgeable people
Review.Contenu: The techy who took our call was knowledgeable but difficult to understand. The connection was very poor (satellite background noise). He solved our invasion/takeover problem in about 1.5 hours, include checking the second computer connected by modem. We were disappointed in the misrepresentation by him and your on-line posting that your company was connected to MS and/or a subcontractor to MS. Neither seems to be the case. That said, your folks do seem to know what they are doing and got us out of a real jam. We hope the year ahead of our contract with you goes well. Thank you again.

Review.Titre: overall
Review.Contenu: overall, I'm pleased with the result.  what caused me to give only 3 stars was the problems I encountered getting where Aaron took control of the computer and did his magic.  The process of inputting my credit and/or debit cards to pay you was infuriating at best.

Review.Titre: Assistance When I Needed It
Review.Contenu: Tuesday, March 7, 20 yeah23I like that the consultant was knowledgeable of the problem & knew what the solution was.  Appreciate how quick the response was to work on the problem.  I’m a senior citizen & I think the plans are too expensive for seniors. There should be a discounted rate for seniors.  The problem appears to have been resolved.  I will know when I get home to work on my computer.  I am grateful Tech Center Plus was there & able to assist me when I needed it.  Thank you for everything.
